name: Jay's
description:
Jay’s is a modern take on the classic steakhouse. It is the embodiment of a bold yet intimate experience—where modern architecture, a nostalgia-evoking soundtrack, and white-glove service form an unforgettable emotional journey. Every detail, from the music selection to the waitstaff’s every movement, is meticulously orchestrated to immerse guests in a living theater. It’s a place of entertainment and camaraderie where every chair feels like the best seat in the house, and every conversation feels like a private exchange in a grand, candlelit salon.

Guests are encouraged to dress for the occasion. The dress code is business casual. Jackets are not required. Please note that baseball caps, tank tops, flip-flops, sweatpants, and swimwear may be permitted at the host’s discretion.  | $45 Corkage Fee
hours:
Tue–Thu, Sun 4:00 pm–10:00 pm
Fri, Sat 4:00 pm–11:30 pm
Sun 11:30 am–2:30 pm

dateMessages.message:
We have a 15 minute grace period. Please call us if you are running later than 15 minutes after your reservation time.

We may contact you about this reservation, so please ensure your email and phone number are up to date.

For dress code, guests are encouraged to dress for the occasion. The dress code is business casual. Jackets are not required. We do not allow shorts, baseball caps, tank-tops, flip flops, sweatpants, or swimwear.

Please call ahead at 954-999-0855. Arrangements for decorations can be made in advance for private parties and events.

offers.name: VIP LOUNGE
offers.description:
The Ultimate VIP Experience at Jay’s Member’s Lounge.

Step into a world of exclusivity at Jay’s Member’s Lounge, our private upstairs retreat designed for those who want to elevate their night out in Fort Lauderdale. Tucked above the main dining room, this intimate space offers lounge-style seating — sleek, cozy tables perfect for cocktails and conversation, rather than formal steakhouse dining — where you and your guests can relax, sip, and savor while overlooking the vibrant energy of Jay’s below.

For a $500 experience fee, guests receive:
✨ Two bottles of Veuve Clicquot Champagne — a perfect start to an unforgettable evening.
✨ Access to our members-only upstairs seating — reserved exclusively for VIP guests, ensuring privacy and luxury in every detail.
✨ Prime “See and Be Seen” placement — from your elevated perch, take in the full view of the stunning restaurant while being part of the night’s most glamorous scene.
✨ Dedicated service — enjoy the attention of a private server and bartender, catering solely to you and your party’s needs all night long.
✨ Personal welcome from Jay, the owner — when available, Jay himself will greet you upstairs to make your evening even more memorable.

Please note: all additional food and beverage beyond the two bottles of Veuve Clicquot are sold separately.

This is more than a reservation — it’s a statement. Whether you’re celebrating a special occasion, impressing out-of-town guests, or simply indulging in the best Jay’s has to offer, the Member’s Lounge delivers a one-of-a-kind experience you won’t find anywhere else in Fort Lauderdale.

Reserve your VIP table now and make it a night to remember.

top3Reviews.author: Gregory
top3Reviews.review:
Ambience: great location and warm feeling inside much larger inside than it looks from outside building.

Food: great happy hour value food and drink options. Though the quality of the steak was questionable for the steak frites happy hour portion. Interesting and fun names on the specialty cocktails. Food portion size seem adequate.

Service: mixed reviews here as it appeared bar staff was not very attentive and more concerned on getting things ready behind the bar even though they’ve been open for a little while. John saved the day and was able to provide insight into the history of the building location and bought is a round for our service concerns.

Overall: I would give this place a try and plan on making another trip there soon myself.

top3Reviews.author: kim
top3Reviews.review: John is truly a manager par excellence. He consistently puts in the work to ensure every guest has an exceptional experience. His attention to detail, professionalism, and genuine care are evident from the moment you arrive. John’s goal is not just to serve guests well, but to make sure you leave already thinking about when you’ll return and he succeeds every time. He is truly exceptional. If you appreciate great food paired with an atmosphere that makes you want to linger, Jay's is a must visit.

top3Reviews.author: Jerry
top3Reviews.review: Fantastic food, service & experience from beginning to end!!

reviewSummary: Jay's is an upscale restaurant with a "wonderful atmosphere" and "fantastic food." The service is often praised, with standout mentions like "amazing staff" and "impeccable service." Guests enjoy the unique setting in a converted church and appreciate the vibrant energy. The menu includes highlights such as the "seafood tower" and "oysters Rockefeller." While some dishes received mixed reviews, the overall experience is positive, making it a recommended spot for special occasions.
